Text: I don't think I have ever seen a good copy of this movie anywhere , I doubt Disney will ever release this on DVD or BLURAY . In  fact they are kinda embarassed about it I think , it's very rarely shown on tv anywhere .
This one looks good to me; colorful and sharp. It's the same A/V as the DVD format linked to above; if you've tried that one and didn't like it, you won't like this one, either.
